amendatorysection.catchline: Legal notices; proof of posting or service.
amendatorysection.para: The posting or service of any notice or other paper required by law may be proved by the affidavit of any competent witness, attached to a copy of said notice or paper, and made within six months of the time of such posting.

annotation.para: Proof by affidavit of posting of public notice is not exclusive. Larimer v. Wallace, 36 Neb. 444, 54 N.W. 835 (1893).
